ygData.subject: Re: Question of Aesthetics
ygData.msgSnippet: True. It gets pretty gaudy being a bard.  White dots, vortexes, sparkles, etc. Also gets pretty rough on the framerate.  Most folks that group often with a
ygData.messageBody:
True.

It gets pretty gaudy being a bard. White dots, vortexes, sparkles, etc.
Also gets pretty rough on the framerate. Most folks that group often with a
bard, and even the bard, tend to turn Particles to LOW or OFF after a while.


----- Original Message -----
From: Benny Hung <benny@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, June 25, 1999 9:48 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Question of Aesthetics


>From: Benny Hung <benny@...>
>
>On Fri, 25 Jun 1999, Brian Dickens wrote:
>> From: Brian Dickens <briandickens@...>
>>
>> When does Selo's start to look different?
>
>
>Level 24, all songs/spells get extra sparkles. Also rumor has it that
>level 39 is another new song effect level.
>
